title: LFM Plat+ Top and Support
body:
Due to unfortunate events we are currently looking for an Top and Support.
We at Re'Mend eSports have been playing the game for many seasons and have won a lot scrims and tournament.


Requirements:
-Must be Platinum+
-Willing to spent time improve
-Doesn't Tilt and rage
-Non-Toxic
-Willing to attend events/scrims and Tournaments 
-1k hours+


Top Laner Requirements:
-Good Map Knowledge
-Wide Champion pool
-Good mechanics


Support Requirements:
-Good synergy with ADC (Will be Test)
-Good Champion pool
-Good Mechanics
-Good Map Knowledge
-Knows how to ward and Where

IF Interested:
-IGN:
-Your experience in r5 or previous teams:
-why you should be picked:
-Your strengths:
-Your weaknesses:
-Your Goals:
-3 best champions for selected roles
-Current Timezone

add Mickawesome if interested 

Cheers

replies.body: these guys are a good group id suggest joining them if u can fill the requirements a good first time rank team to play with but if u are experienced just dont be too hasty with them as in dont expect the best of the best they are still learning

to bad we couldn't meet your expectations since you were a good support but i think you well alittle hasty about your judgement since after our loss we went on to win 4 more games and placed 4th in the tournament, not bad for having 2 subs XD

-IGN: Dr watermelon
-Your experience in r5 or previous teams: Played on a challenger team, as well as help as analyst on a master team, more than 500+ games of experience as shot caller last season, looking to grow and improve as a team.
-why you should be picked: I have strong desire in helping, guiding people and helping teams is something i enjoy, this current tank meta help a lot my game style since i have a very strong lane phase as well as a good sense of roaming and timing.
-Your strengths: Play most of the tanks, big champion pool as well as mechanics, strong knowledge about top lane, wave management, split pushing, tps and etc. Most likely heavy cc top laners or peeling dmg dealers.
-Your weaknesses: Sometimes im way too ahead of the plays so i require a team to synergyse. always looking to find openings and plays and sometimes backfires.
-Your Goals: Grow as a team and as a player to have more fun by being competitive.
-3 best champions for selected roles: Vary according to the meta, right now im enjoying playing ekko, mao and malph. but once again depend on the meta and the team comps, i will adapt according to the team needs and the meta requirements too.
-Current Timezone: Sydney

-IGN: Abyss Templar

-Your experience in r5 or previous teams: Use to play in teams, 

-why you should be picked: I meet the criteria for the player you are looking for

-Your strengths: Very Knowledgable about the game and competitive gameplay

-Your weaknesses: Mechanics but will improve over time, and a little marcro play ( havent played for 3 weeks but slowly getting back into it)

-Your Goals: Get to challenger, play for a team

-3 best champions for selected roles
 More comfort pick rather than  best for roles

-Current Timezone NZDT, GMT +12, Generally work off AEST since most of the teams are based in Australia

I am interested in the support role as well.

**IGN:** Cuddly Panda
**Your experience in R5 or previous teams:** 
Played in a few ranked 5 teams back in the day, which peaked at Plat II or so. Played for a team on the Cybergamer ladder, Tahmahri, for a bit which was interesting.. Multiple 5 person queues as well. 

**Why you should be picked:** 
I'm a laid back person that can make a killer egg on toast.

**Your strengths:** 
Map knowledge and awareness, laning phase, them sexy plays, roams.

**Your weaknesses:** I don't like talking much.

**Your Goals: **
Find a decent team or adc duo to play with, improve with, and climb to diamond/master/challenger with.

**3 best champions for selected roles:** 
Can play most champions, but.. Thresh / Alistar / Leona

**Current Timezone:** UTC+12:00
